name: shaarli
description: Shaarli is a self-hosted bookmark manager and link sharing application. It allows tagging, private or public links, and simple theming, providing a minimal alternative to online bookmarking services.
features: Bookmark management: Save and organize web links with titles, descriptions, and tags.
Tagging system: Categorize bookmarks with multiple tags for flexible organization.
Public or private: Control visibility of individual bookmarks or entire collections.
RSS feeds: Generates RSS feeds for sharing bookmarks with others or syncing to readers.
Full-text search: Find bookmarks quickly by searching titles, descriptions, tags, or URLs.
Import and export: Migrate bookmarks from browsers or other services via standard formats.
Markdown support: Format bookmark descriptions with markdown for rich text.
Daily links: Automatically creates daily pages aggregating bookmarks by date.
Permalink structure: Generates clean, permanent URLs for individual bookmarks.
Theme customization: Modify appearance with custom CSS or choose from available themes.
Plugin system: Extends functionality with community plugins for additional features.
No database required: Stores all data in flat files for simple deployment and backup.
